name: LoadJsonVariables
description: Load variables from a JSON file
author: Geek Learning

inputs.name: VariablePrefix
inputs.label: Prefix to use for loaded variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Loaded variables will be named PREFIX_VariableName

inputs.name: MarkAsSecret
inputs.label: Indicates if created variables should be marked as secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked variables created by this task will be marked secret
